text: 3:24 Aposel 13:39; Rom 10:4; Galesia 2:16; Kolosi 2:17; Hibru 9:9-10God kamaghɨn ifonge, e nɨghnɨzir gavgavim Akar Aghuimɨn ikɨtɨ, a suam, ia nan damazimɨn dera. Egha, a uaghan kamaghɨn ifonge, Moses Osirizir Araziba e inigh Krais bagh mangam. Egha kamaghɨn a Moses Osirizir Arazibagh amizɨ, da e gativagha en garir gumazimɨn mɨn oto.
